languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт хмурится.{/n} "Мои сородичи {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}остались править миром из теней{/d}, и мне это не по душе. Нам не должно искать власти над иными племенами. Судьба Крудараха, путь в {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутину{/g} — вот что должно волновать их, а не игры во власть. Однако на их судьбу я могу повлиять не более, чем на разразившийся шторм. Могу лишь жалеть, что они выбрали такой путь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт хмурится.{/n} "Мои сородичи остались править миром из теней, и мне это не по душе. Нам не должно искать власти над иными племенами. Судьба Крудараха, путь в {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутину{/g} — вот что должно волновать их, а не игры во власть. Однако на их судьбу я могу повлиять не более, чем на разразившийся шторм. Могу лишь жалеть, что они выбрали такой путь".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}stayed to rule the world from the shadows{/d}, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

Однако на их судьбу я могу повлиять не более, чем на разразившийся шторм. Могу лишь жалеть, что они выбрали такой путь".

The fate of Crudarach, the path to the Webway — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特皱起了眉。{/n}“我的族人{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}留在了那里，在暗中统治那个世界{/d}。这并不是我渴望的结果，我们不该寻求支配其他部族的权力，也不该参与精心设计的权力游戏。我们需要探索克鲁达拉赫的命运，寻找通往{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的道路，这才是最重要的事情。然而，我无法改变他们的命运，就像我无法改变风暴的去向一样。我只能为他们的选择感到遗憾。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}stayed to rule the world from the shadows{/d}, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特皱起了眉。{/n}“我的族人留在了那里，在暗中统治那个世界。这并不是我渴望的结果，我们不该寻求支配其他部族的权力，也不该参与精心设计的权力游戏。我们需要探索克鲁达拉赫的命运，寻找通往{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}的道路，这才是最重要的事情。然而，我无法改变他们的命运，就像我无法改变风暴的去向一样。我只能为他们的选择感到遗憾。”

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin stayed to rule the world from the shadows, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the Webway — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño.{/n} «Mi pueblo {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}se quedó para gobernar el mundo desde las sombras{/d}, lo que no me satisface personalmente. No deberíamos ejercer el control sobre otras tribus. El destino de Crudarach, el camino a la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}: eso es lo que importa, no las tramas elaboradas para hacerse con el poder. A pesar de ello, al igual que no puedo cambiar el curso de una tormenta, no puedo influir sobre sus destinos. Lo único que me queda es lamentar sus decisiones».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}stayed to rule the world from the shadows{/d}, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño.{/n} «Mi pueblo se quedó para gobernar el mundo desde las sombras, lo que no me satisface personalmente. No deberíamos ejercer el control sobre otras tribus. El destino de Crudarach, el camino a la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g}: eso es lo que importa, no las tramas elaboradas para hacerse con el poder. A pesar de ello, al igual que no puedo cambiar el curso de una tormenta, no puedo influir sobre sus destinos. Lo único que me queda es lamentar sus decisiones».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは顔をしかめる。{/n}「私の同族は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}影から世界を支配するため{/d}に残った。だが、それは私の好むところではない。他の部族に対する権力を求めるべきではないのだ。クルダラの運命、{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}への道…これこそが重要なのであって、入り組んだ権力闘争ではない。だが、私が彼らの運命を左右できるのは、巻き起こる嵐の進路を変えるのと同じことだ。私にできるのは、彼らの選択を悔やむことだけなのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}stayed to rule the world from the shadows{/d}, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは顔をしかめる。{/n}「私の同族は影から世界を支配するために残った。だが、それは私の好むところではない。他の部族に対する権力を求めるべきではないのだ。クルダラの運命、{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}への道…これこそが重要なのであって、入り組んだ権力闘争ではない。だが、私が彼らの運命を左右できるのは、巻き起こる嵐の進路を変えるのと同じことだ。私にできるのは、彼らの選択を悔やむことだけなのだ」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Mein Volk {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}ist geblieben, um die Welt aus den Schatten heraus zu regieren{/d}, was mir nicht gänzlich gefällt. Wir sollten keine Macht über andere Stämme anstreben. Das Schicksal von Crudarach, der Pfad zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} – das ist, was zählt, nicht ausgeklügelte Machtspielchen. Und doch kann ich ihr Schicksal ebenso wenig beeinflussen, wie ich den Verlauf eines Sturms verändern kann. Ich kann nur eines tun, ihre Entscheidungen bedauern."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}stayed to rule the world from the shadows{/d}, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Mein Volk ist geblieben, um die Welt aus den Schatten heraus zu reagieren, was mir nicht gänzlich gefällt. Wir sollten keine Macht über andere Stämme anstreben. Das Schicksal von Crudarach, der Pfad zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} — das ist, was zählt, nicht ausgeklügelte Machtspielchen. Und doch kann ich ihr Schicksal ebenso wenig beeinflussen, wie ich den Verlauf eines Sturms verändern kann. Ich kann nur eines tun, ihre Entscheidungen bedauern."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Mes semblables sont {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}restés là-bas pour diriger le monde dans l'ombre{/d}, ce qui n'est pas vraiment pour me plaire. Nous ne devrions pas chercher à dominer d'autres tribus. Le sort de Crudarach, la voie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} : voilà ce qui compte réellement, pas ces jeux de pouvoir élaborés. Malheureusement, je suis aussi incapable d'influencer leurs destins que de changer la trajectoire d'une tempête. Tout ce que je peux faire, c'est regretter leurs choix. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}stayed to rule the world from the shadows{/d}, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Mes semblables sont restés là-bas pour diriger le monde dans l'ombre, ce qui n'est pas vraiment pour me plaire. Nous ne devrions pas chercher à dominer d'autres tribus. Le sort de Crudarach, la voie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} : voilà ce qui compte réellement, pas ces jeux de pouvoir élaborés. Malheureusement, je suis aussi incapable d'influencer leurs destins que de changer la trajectoire d'une tempête. Tout ce que je peux faire, c'est regretter leurs choix. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarım, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}dünyayı gölgelerden yönetmek için orada kaldılar{/d} ki bu, çok da hoşuma gitmiyor. Diğer kabileleri ezerek güç sahibi olmamalıyız. Crudarach'ın kaderi, {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol'a{/g} uzanan yol... Önemli olan bunlar, çetrefilli güç oyunları değil. Ancak gürleyen bir fırtınanın rotasını nasıl değiştiremiyorsam onların kaderlerine de etki edemiyorum. Elimden tek gelen, yaptıkları seçimlerin azabını çekmek."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns.{/n} "My kin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}stayed to rule the world from the shadows{/d}, which is not entirely to my liking. We should not seek power over other tribes. The fate of Crudarach, the path to the {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} — this is what matters, not elaborate power plays. And yet I can influence their fates no more than I can change the course of a rolling storm. All I can do is regret their choices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarım, dünyayı gölgelerden yönetmek için orada kalmışlardı ki bu çok da hoşuma gitmiyor. Diğer kabileleri ezerek güç sahibi olmamalıyız. Crudarach'ın kaderi, {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g}'a uzanan yol... Önemli olan bunlar, çetrefilli güç oyunları değil. Ancak gürleyen bir fırtınanın rotasını nasıl değiştiremiyorsam, onların kaderlerine de etki edemiyorum. Elimden tek gelen, yaptıkları seçimlerin vicdan azabını çekmek."
